name: Moon Mission (Kingoat)
description:
Hello everybody, this is my first ever "completed" project, due to personal reasons i wasn't able to profit from the 30days period of the jam, i only worked on it for 8 days, and i was forced to change the engine in the middle of development due to complication, so i did my best.

This game is a basic high score based shooter, with elements to fit with the jam's theme, it obviously is lacking in many regards due to my beginner status and the time limitations, i'm looking forward to hear you feedbacks!

i hope you'll enjoy.

Sincerly, Kingoat.
